text: Ane musa a.Sa. Eka eva samaye saheramam avya jyare ke saherana loko bedarakara hatam, ahinya be vyakti'one jhaghadata joya, eka to temana mitro manthi hato ane bijo temana satru'o manthi hato, teni komavala'o'e teni virud'dha, je temana satru'o manthi hato, temane phariyada kari, tena karane musa a.Sa.E tene mukko maryo, jena karane te mrtyu pamyo, musa a.Sa. Kaheva lagya ke a to setananum karya che, kharekhara setana satru ane spasta rite pathabhrasta karanara che
